scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains ca. 133 items, handwritten and V-mail letters, from Private James Edwin Spraker, Battery D, 18th Battalion, Fifth Field Artillery Regiment, to his mother, Mrs. F. H. Spraker, Rural Retreat, Virginia, during his World War II military service in the United Statesand Europe. There is a single letter from Mrs. Spraker to her son, December 29, 1944, containing local and family news.
